column4: any body knows how should i remove USB dongle for wireless internet in safe way because for me once i unplug the device other usb stop to work for other devices until i restart the system
does this problem only happen with your dongle or with other USB devices as well?
even with other device example if i unplug usb flash without unmounting the problem occurs
okay, good, that means that its not specific to your dongle
what are you running Hardy Heron on? whats your make and model?
I mean, what desktop/laptop are you using?
google your make and usb problems and see if it isn't specific to Ubuntu or not and get back to me
i dont find any helpfull document by googling my problem on internet
